column4: Help, how do I search for all packages which contain "bz2" and see which are installed?
Eh, it's not really that slow.  Maybe you just have sucky wifi?
my wifi hardware and link quality are great. Its slwo.
Comparing it to smb over end-to-end-gigabit with quality cables, yes, slow.  Compared to NFSv4 or SCP over wifi, it's fine.
